body:
Hey everyone, what you're reading now is probably going to be the last you hear of me for about a month.
I am travelling somewhere for holidays and the place i am going does not have internet, and my computer is under updates, so i will be inactive for about  a month.

I am very upset that i cannot be on at all around the christmas days, as i know the atmosphere will be incredible, so merry christmas all, and ill be back somewhere around January the 10th - 15th.

Enjoy your holidays :)

- OPTOBAT

title: Holidays Whereabouts

replies.body:
Temporary leaving posts are not allowed, sorry.
But other than that, have a good trip
